attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the Great Reset!
attributes.additional_details: The Government should not be able to lead the country down a route that will significantly change all of our lives without consulting the nation about it and allowing us to vote for or against it.
attributes.background: Stop the U.K Government participating in the Great Reset without allowing the people a referendum!

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
